info.p: The Moving Picture Experts Group (MPEG) is the "umbrella" organization and working group that creates and develops standards for digital audio and video compression, packaging, and transmission.
MPEG-1 is the initial video and audio for digital storage media (like Video CDs), up to about 1.5 Mbit/s.

ul.li: description at the Digital Formats web site by the Library of Congress,
